headline: Five Farms Irish Cream and Holladay Bourbon Bring Spirited Flavor to Tales of the Cocktail 2025 in New Orleans
summary: Holladay Bourbon Smash Holladay Bourbon Smash Five Farms Irish Cream in New Orleans Five Farms Irish Cream in New Orleans New Orleans, La., July 25, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- In a city where every cocktail tells a story, Five Farms Irish Cream and Holladay Bourbon made a memorable mark at Tales of the Cocktail 2025, weaving their distinct heritages into the vibrant fabric of New Orleans' world-famous drinks festival and conference. The weeklong celebration brought together bartenders, brand leade

headline: McCormick Adopts Clearwater’s CP Platform to Streamline Capital Strategy
summary: Clearwater Analytics Holdings, Inc. (NYSE:CWAN) is one of the growth stocks that could double by 2027. On July 22, McCormick & Company (NYSE:MKC) announced its adoption of Clearwater Analytics’ commercial paper workflow solution to modernize short-term capital raising. The move comes amid a surge in U.S. commercial paper issuance, which topped $1.4 trillion in May […]
